ygData.subject: Re: Jade Reavers
ygData.msgSnippet: Really!  You got lucky to get one so soon.  They should make it ultra rare.  I ve only been in one reaver group, and we got nothing.  I ve had guildies tell me
ygData.messageBody:
Really! You got lucky to get one so soon. They should make it ultra
rare. I've only been in one reaver group, and we got nothing. I've
had guildies tell me they've been there for hours, 8 or more, and
gotten nothing. And then there's the spawns! You can get 3,4,6,10
at a time sometimes. Oh the excitement!

I do like hunting in CoM for XP. We usually fight our way to our
spot and back out if need be. Usually there are a couple other
groups around to clear out some of the way.

BTW, I still don't have a Jade Reaver myself.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Pathfinder of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Wulfric Rennison"
<rgillispie@t...> wrote:
> Just to let everyone know...
>
> hunting black reavers in City of Mist SUCKS!!!!
>
> tough zone to move around in. Lots of undead that see invis and a
2 hour spawn rate on the reavers. Not to mention secret passages and
crazy aggros....
>
>
> What a crock of shite I tell ya! And only one jade reaver to show
for it. With 3 in group that need them.
>
> Raido
> 52 dru
> Cazic Thule server
